ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($Profile.Name !='Portal API User - RFQ' || $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - Self-Registration' || $Profile.Name !='Portal Interfaces App User' || $Profile.Name !='Portal User - Self-Registration' || $Profile.Name !='Portal Hon Adminstrator' || $Profile.Name !='Portal API User - MCORE' || $Profile.Name !='Portal API User RO Automation' || $Profile.Name <> $Label.API_data_Load_Profile))
